properties.name: conductor.metrics-logger.reportPeriodSeconds
properties.description: The interval (in seconds) at which the metrics will be reported into the log stream by the metrics-logger.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.http.readTimeout
properties.description: The read timeout of the underlying HttpClient used by the HTTP task.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.http.connectTimeout
properties.description: The connection timeout of the underlying HttpClient used by the HTTP task.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.kafka-publish.requestTimeoutMs
properties.description: The request.timeout.ms value that the kafka producer is configured with in the KAFKA_PUBLISH task.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.kafka-publish.maxBlockMs
properties.description: The max.block.ms value that the kafka producer is configured with in the KAFKA_PUBLISH task.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.kafka-publish.cacheSize
properties.description: The maximum number of entries permitted in the in-memory cache used by the KAFKA_PUBLISH task.

properties.name: conductor.tasks.kafka-publish.cacheTimeMs
properties.description: The duration after which a cached entry will be removed from the in-memory cache used by the KAFKA_PUBLISH task.
